Room.Name: Goblin Torture Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the goblin's torture chamber. Would you rather be elsewhere?
Room.LongDescription: A stretch rack is against one wall, and a hot brazier is against another, with several orange-red pokers lying in the coals. Chains with cuffs hang from the ceiling, ready for service. A vat of seething acid gives off fumes that makes your eyes and nose burn. Laid out on an instrument cart are long needles, easily twenty centimeters in length, used to probe the inner parts of eyes and ears and other body cavities.
